declarations.comments: Monad responsible for handling a single request.
declarations.title: HandlerM

declarations.comments: Call next handler/plugin in a chain.
declarations.title: next

declarations.comments: Call next handler/plugin and pass error to it.
declarations.title: nextThrow

declarations.comments:
Get route param value. If it is a named route, e.g. `/user/:id`, then
`getRouteParam "id"` returns the matched part of the route. If it is a
regex route, e.g. `/user/(\d+)`, then `getRouteParam 1` returns the
part that matched `(\d+)` and `getRouteParam 0` returns the whole route.
declarations.title: getRouteParam

declarations.comments: Monad responsible for server related operations (initial setup mostly).
declarations.title: ServerM

declarations.comments:
Create a Restify server with the given options, perform the given setup actions,
and start it running on the given port.
declarations.title: listenHttp

declarations.comments:
Create a Restify server with the default options, perform the given setup actions,
and start it running on the given port.
declarations.title: listenHttp'

declarations.comments: Apply Server actions to a Restify server.
declarations.title: apply

declarations.comments: Bind specified handler to handle request matching route and method.
declarations.title: http
